depPlanDesc: It is a comprehensive and integrated plan for treating the individual in all its cognitive, behavioral, and emotional aspects. It sets goals and uses all the necessary techniques to achieve them. It uses time in the best way and uses all the necessary therapeutic interventions, achieving the best therapeutic results in depth in the soul and impact on life and more stability for its positive results.

client_registration: • The client (beneficiary) registers his personal information to create a private account before subscribing to any individual or group consultation or any skills training.
therapeutic_relationship: • He is asked during the therapeutic relationship to maintain respect for the therapeutic framework that will be explained to him later, such as paying subscriptions on time, being present minutes before the start of the session online, not asking to transfer his treatment outside the application, being in a private place alone without noise or communications, knowing his role and the role of the specialist, and the type of treatment he is benefiting from and its limits, maintaining frankness and respecting time and communication principles.
payment_method: • Payment is made in advance either by transferring to the admin's account via the bank or WISH, OMT, Westerunion, others.
send_receipt: • Send a copy of the receipt to the admin.
responsibility_for_payment: • He is responsible for paying the transfer cost in addition to the cost of the sessions in dollars.
recommendation: As a specialist, you must read these recommendations well
specialist_account_creation: • When the specialist creates his account, his personal information and required files are only accessible to the admin, while job-related and specialized information are included in his account that will be visible to clients.
professional_requirements: • The specialist is asked to send certain files to ensure that he meets the professional standards.
ethical_conduct: • The specialist is required to respect the professional ethics and not transfer online sessions outside the app or to his clinic.
professional_ethics: • The specialist must respect the principles of neutrality, scientific integrity, and the rights and privacy of clients.
respect_laws: • The specialist must maintain professional ethics and respect public laws.
correct_framework: • The specialist must maintain a proper framework for online sessions.
punctuality: • The specialist is required to respect the scheduled appointments and be present before the session begins.
platform_usage_restriction: • The platform should not be used by anyone under the age of 18.
emergency_cases: • In case of emergencies, the user should immediately contact the local mental health professional or an ambulance for help.
disclaimer: • The administration is specifically exempt from any responsibility or obligation that may arise from any misunderstandings, incorrect information, or damages resulting from communication between the specialist and any user.
company_responsibility: • The company's role is limited to providing the technology that enables the delivery of the company's services to the user through specialists, and the specialist holds exclusive responsibility for the services provided.
session_booking_details: • Download the Wellbeing Day app, create a personal account, then go to the health page, select the disorder, then go to the types of disorders page, then to the specialists page, select the suitable specialist and book a session. Afterward, communicate privately with the specialist in the appointments page through chat, voice call, or video call.
why_online_session: Why do you need to talk to a specialist online?
why_online_session_details: • One in eight people worldwide suffers from a mental or behavioral disorder, but only a small percentage seek help or treatment. Online consultation allows you to schedule appointments with the specialist that fit your daily routine, easy communication with the specialist from the comfort of your home, complete privacy.
sessions_needed: How many sessions will you need for treatment?
sessions_needed_details: • The number of treatment sessions varies based on the case and diagnosis, but in general, the patient needs 5-10 sessions. Several factors contribute to faster improvement, such as the client's desire to improve, their commitment to the therapist's directions, performing required exercises, attending sessions regularly, and the treatment's progression.
how_is_info_handled_details: • All your information is handled with high confidentiality and privacy, whether it is the information sent via social media, registration details, or the information shared with the specialist during, before, or after the sessions.
breaking_confidentiality: • There are 3 situations where confidentiality is broken and authorities are informed: if there is a genuine intent to commit suicide; if there is a genuine threat to the life of another person, especially children and elderly persons being abused.
what_to_expect_from_consultation: What can I expect from the consultation?
what_to_expect_from_consultation_details: • A professional and effective relationship between the psychologist and you. It can be difficult to look beyond our own boundaries and perspectives, but counseling provides ways to improve our daily lives from an unbiased, professional viewpoint, without any judgment on us during that process.
what_if_late: What if one party is late for the session?
what_if_late_details: • Sessions will be terminated 15 minutes after one of the parties has not shown up. If the delay is from the client’s side, you may communicate with the specialist. If the delay is from the specialist’s side within the given time frame, the specialist will contact you when available, or you may cancel the session and receive a refund.
platform_intro:
This platform and app are a real achievement, as we made the most out of technology to serve humanity. We moved the clinic’s work into the app with its components and conditions. Some of the advantages that the app offers include: 
 Quick access to consultations or starting with the symptoms the individual is experiencing, followed by consultation, or accessing the list of specialists to choose the most suitable one.
howDoYouFeel: How do you feel? Write a short description of your condition to present to the specialist
term2: When needed for referral to appropriate treatment or specialist
term3: When the psychological or physical condition is not clear

term2Instant: Do not request a session in cases of suicide or harm yourself or others

clientInstructionsPoints: The client (the beneficiary) records their personal information to create a private account before participating in any individual or group consultation or skills training. During the therapeutic relationship, they are asked to maintain respect for the therapeutic framework, which will later be explained to them, such as paying subscriptions on time, arriving a few minutes before the online session starts, not requesting to transfer their therapy outside the application, being in a private place alone without noise or calls, knowing their role and the specialist's role, the type of therapy they are benefiting from and its limits, maintaining honesty, respecting time, and proper communication etiquette. Payment should be made in advance either through a bank transfer to the admin's account or WISH, OMT, Western Union, or others. A copy of the receipt should be sent to the admin. They must cover the cost of the transfer in addition to the session fees in dollars.
